DOMESTIC, JAPANESE & EUROPEAN AUTO REPAIR

for all of Riverside County

It's hard enough to find a good auto repair shop in Riverside County, but finding an expert mechaninc for your Lexus or Acura is even more difficult.
Luckily, Precision Import Auto Repair offers expert domestic, Japanese and European auto repair services. Conveniently located in Corona. We are only a short drive away for all your repair needs.
Vehicles are constantly evolving as new technology comes out everyday. Combine that nature with the production standards of Japanese vehicles, and your car becomes a complex machine that needs delicate care from quality experts. Our ASE certifide team of mechanics offer that exact level of service for all Japanese makes and models that enter our shop.

Since 2001, Precision Import Auto Repair has provided full-service repairs for the most complicated cares on the road, especially Japanese imports.

We make your care safe, reliable and comfortable to drive

CAR PROBLEMS?

Visit Our Auto Repair
Shop in Corona

Our specialty may be Japanese imports, but there is no problem we can't fix for domestic and European brands as well. Precision Import Auto Repair operates a state-of-the-art facility that can serve any make and model you drive. Our outo repair shop is one of the leaders i the car repair industry because we have the rools and the skills to make your car run like new.
We take the time in every auto repair service to comprehensively understand the problem. From there, we can do it all: simple brake repairs, suspension work, starter and alternator replacement, auro electric check, cooling system repair, and much more. While we maytake the time to get to the root of the problem, we complete our repairs and maintenance within a fast turnaraound time.
For domestic, Japanese, and European auto repair, Precision Import Auto Repair is the best repair shop in the county. Drive in today for emergency assistance or call us now to schedule a repair instead.
